descriptionNullable:
Time series data is collected from a smart IMU based wearable device which is used to capture the movements of human arm. The device offers real-time and continuous monitoring of motion data while communicating in real time via Bluetooth LE.
The goal of gesture classification is to allow an operator to utilize pre-defined hand gestures to command and direct a Robotic Scanner to specific regions of interest where the 3D scanner produces the 3D point cloud data for digital comaprision.

For gesture recognition, four unique gestures are defined which are labeled as:
i.	Robot moves to a point
ii.	Calibrate
iii.	Scan area of interest
iv.	Move to home position
title: Human activity recognition
subtitle: Human arm activity classification data
